VOIPResponse Class Reference

This class is an interface used by the VOIPClient to send callbacks to the BigWorld client and ultimately a python script. More...

#include <voip.hpp>

Public Member Functions

virtual void response (int message, const VOIPDataDict *data)=0
 This function represents a callback available to the VoIP implementation to communicate with the client script code.

Detailed Description

This class is an interface used by the VOIPClient to send callbacks to the BigWorld client and ultimately a python script.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void VOIPResponse::response ( int  message,
const VOIPDataDict *  data 
) [pure virtual]

This function represents a callback available to the VoIP implementation to communicate with the client script code.

Parameters:
message An integer with a VoIP implementation defined meaning.
data A set of string value pairs that will be passed into the script as a python dictionary.

Implemented in PyVOIPResponse.
